documentsJson.title: Asian Broadcasting Union, 1968-1969
documentsJson.description: 1968 to 1969 correspondence regarding the Asian Broadcasting Union. Correspondence from ABU Secretary-General Charles Moses informs or requests action from members on various topics, particularly space communications and the Prix Jeunesse International, a competition for youth television programs. Also includes meeting reports, agendas, and schedules for ABU general assemblies.
